attributes.action: To Nicola Sturgeon, SNP Ldr. Please exercise right to block UK departure from EU
attributes.background: I believe that it is critically important for the youth of today to remain in EU. The issue around immigration has been misreported. It is clear we have more immigrants entering UK from outside Europe than from those within.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
